title: Creative ceramics: using the banding wheel
brief_description: The basic fundamentals of working with clay, concentrating on the many valuable uses of the banding or simple decorating wheel. Introduces simple tools, and how they are used - paint brushes, needle point tools, wire loops and even hair combs. Demonstrates the plastic, flexible and manageable qualities of clay.
